name: ContentTransparencySetting
shortdesc: Transparency settings for the content of the parent object.

property.name: dropShadowSettings
property.shortdesc: Settings related to the drop shadow effect.

property.name: featherSettings
property.shortdesc: Settings related to the feather effect.

property.name: innerShadowSettings
property.shortdesc: Settings related to the inner shadow effect.

property.name: outerGlowSettings
property.shortdesc: Settings related to the outer glow effect.

property.name: innerGlowSettings
property.shortdesc: Settings related to the inner glow effect.

property.name: bevelAndEmbossSettings
property.shortdesc: Settings related to the bevel and emboss effect.

property.name: satinSettings
property.shortdesc: Settings related to the satin effect

property.name: directionalFeatherSettings
property.shortdesc: Settings related to the directional feather effect.

property.name: gradientFeatherSettings
property.shortdesc: Settings related to the gradient feather effect.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the ContentTransparencySetting (a PageItem, HtmlItem, FormField, SignatureField, TextBox, RadioButton, ListBox, ComboBox, CheckBox, MultiStateObject, Button, MediaItem, Sound, Movie, EPSText, SplineItem, Polygon, GraphicLine, Rectangle, Oval, Graphic, ImportedPage, PICT, WMF, PDF, EPS, Image, Group, TextFrame, PageItemDefault or ObjectStyle).

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ContentTransparencySetting.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
